𒁍 𒋤 𒈲 𒁐
𒁍 ≈ 𒉽𒑖𒀸
𒁍 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒀸 ≈ 𒊺𒀸
𒋤 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒐈 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒊑
𒈲 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒐈𒌋 ≈ 𒊺𒊑 ŠE.RI SÍR 𒉣

𒁍 ≈ 𒋓 ŠIR ≈ 𒉡 sir₅
𒁍 •spear 𒉡 sir₅ "pointed" 𒁍 •super 𒁍 #šapûʳ > 1. SÍR 2. púʳ

𒁍 SÍR 𒋤 ⇔ 𒈲 serpent
𒁍 SÍR 𓋴𓂋𓏮𓃱 "long"
𒁍 sir₂ sűrű ხშირი xširi #šapû 𒁍 puᵏ πυκνός puknós "dense" 𒁍 SÍR sir₂ zerr tear tie 𒂡 sir₃ "bind" 𒁍 PÚʳ BUʳ buˡ béʳ

𒁍 sir₂ 𒊺𒅕 še-er šer "reddening" 𒁍𒎌 𓏞 *kŕ̥miš “worms” crimson 𓍿 𓅓 𓋴 see red ☑

𒁍 SÍR tree 𓍿 𓂋 𓏏 𓆭 | willow | sirat ≈ sáxat 𒄑𒊮𒆗 šag₄dan söğüt salix 𒁍 SÍR 𒊮 ŠÀʳ хӕрис 𐀁 𐀪𐀏 ˢe-ri-ka sarga 𒄑𒊮𒆗 šagkal "willow"

𒁍 GID₂ in 𒄑𒁍 #gidim "irrigator"
𒁍 GID₂ ≈ kid 𒌉 in 𒄀𒌉 gi-di4 #gidim "irrigator"
𒁍 GID₂ in 𒀉𒁍𒁕 ar-gid2-da #ariktu agida 𒄑𒁍𒁕 is.púʳ "spear"™ • sword "lance"

𒁍 GID₂ guide

𒁍 GID₂ great : to be long #arkum #arākum (“long”) 𒁍𒁕 #ᵈaraku 𒀀𒋆𒌅 a-rik-tu arc length
𒁍 GID₂ Geleit : to lead (an animal)
𒁍 GID₂
to lengthen, stretch
to pull, tow, drag
to measure, survey
to milk

𒁕𒁍 the Bear

𒊮𒁉 / 𒊮𒁀 / 𒊮𒀊 / 𒊮𒁍 libbu: Liebe / la pompe (𒁉bi,𒁀ba,𒀊ab,𒁍pu…)

The dangling 'r' component of DUR/púʳ becomes evident in

𒁍𒆳 = 𒁍𒉽 bukur Bursche puer (first)born!
𒁍𒉌 buʳ-ni burning brightening ⇔
𒊓𒊏𒁍 sa-ra-puʳ dye (red), fire, to burn
𒋩𒁍 su-puʳ supreme 𒋩𒁁 ⇔ 𒍢𒊒
𒋗𒁍𒌑 šu-puʳ-ú supreme, resplendent
𒋢𒁍𒊑 su-pu-ri super… (increase)
𒋢 𒁍𒌑𒀀 su puʳ-ú-a …prayer
𒁍𒄴𒊑 pu-uḫ-ri परिषद् parire (assemble) ⇔ pariṣad
𒄿𒆏𒁺𒉌 i-kap-pu-du-ni kaavapiirros(ni) plan
𒅅𒁍𒌓 ik-buʳ-ud ausbrüten "devise" (evil etc)

On the other hand it is missing in

𒁍𒌓𒊑 pu-uṭ-ri vapauttaa® absolve

𒄿𒊒𒌒𒁍 i-ru-ub-bu erupt, quake
